code:
const phrase1 = `Introducing AfriGifts, a collection of beautifully crafted mugs, notebooks, and magnets, each inspired by the rich heritage of African art. 
These unique and artistic gifts are perfect for anyone who appreciates \n the beauty of African culture. \n
From the bold and vibrant designs to the intricate details, every piece is a masterpiece in its own right \n. 
At Afrithings, we understand the joy of gift-giving, which is why we are offering FREE DELIVERY with every purchase of an AfriGift. 
It's our gift to you for choosing to share the beauty of African art with your loved ones.With our AfriGifts collection, you can celebrate the richness of African culture and give a gift that is truly meaningful. 
Whether it's for a friend, family member, or colleague, our collection has something for everyone.
Shop now and discover the beauty of AfriGifts. \n Don't miss out on the opportunity to give a gift that will be treasured forever. And with free delivery, there's no better time to buy`;
const Aboutphrase = `
Welcome to Afrithings, a brand dedicated to showcasing the beauty and diversity of African art and design. We are a black-owned business and proud of it! Our passion for promoting African culture drives everything we do, from the unique designs on our products to the messages we spread.

At Afrithings, we believe that African art deserves to be celebrated and recognized worldwide. We strive to create products that not only look great but also carry meaning and symbolism that connects with our customers. Whether you’re shopping for a t-shirt, hoodie, or mug, you can be sure that our products are thoughtfully designed and crafted with care.

As a black-owned business, we are committed to supporting our community and promoting diversity. By choosing Afrithings, you are not only getting high-quality products but also supporting a business that is passionate about creating positive change. We are dedicated to using our platform to raise awareness about important issues and to support causes that we believe in.

We believe in transparency and honesty in everything we do, from the materials we use to the way we treat our customers. We want to build a community where everyone feels valued and respected. If you have any questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to reach out to us. We are always happy to hear from you and will do our best to make sure you are satisfied with your purchase.

Thank you for choosing Afrithings. By shopping with us, you are not only getting a great product, but you are also supporting a business that is dedicated to making a positive impact. Let's continue to celebrate the beauty and diversity of African art and design together!
`;
const RefundPhrase = `
We understand that sometimes things don't work out, and that's okay. We want you to be happy with your Afrithings purchase, so we offer a hassle-free returns policy. If you decide that your purchase isn't right for you, we'll gladly accept your return within 7 days of receiving the item, as long as it is unused and in its original condition. Please note that the cost of shipping for returns will be at the customer's expense, but don't worry, once we receive the returned item and confirm that it meets our return criteria, we'll happily refund your original shipping cost.

In the rare case that your item is faulty, please let us know immediately, and we will be more than happy to help you out. Just provide us with evidence of the fault, and we'll take care of everything.

We hope you love your Afrithings purchase, but if you need to make a return, we promise to make it as easy as possible for you.

`;
const Celebrating = `
Celebrating African Art and Design: The Story Behind Afrithings
`;
const StorySoFar = `
Africa, a continent of diverse cultures, languages, and traditions, has a rich history of art and design that dates back thousands of years. From the ancient rock paintings of the Sahara Desert to the intricate beadwork of the Zulu tribe in South Africa, African art is as varied as the people who create it. Afrithings is a print-on-demand business that celebrates this beautiful heritage by offering clothing and accessories adorned with African art and design. In today's blog, we'll take a closer look at the story behind Afrithings, and how we strive to share the beauty of African culture with the world.
`;
export { phrase1, Aboutphrase, RefundPhrase };

sourcesContent:

Shop now and discover the beauty of AfriGifts. \n Don't miss out on the opportunity to give a gift that will be treasured forever. And with free delivery, there's no better time to buy`
